name: Command F9
mod-description: This Mod change the command F9 (drop all items)
variable-WEAPONS-description: Do not drop weapons and shields.
variable-MOVEMENT-description: Do not drop Riding Hamster and Hoverboard.
variable-TRANSPORT-description: Do not drop (Big) Pannier and Barrow.
variable-MULTIPLE_ITEMS-description: Drop all items of chosen types (Tools, Weapons, Movement, Transport) except one.
variable-LOWER_ITEMS-description: Drop lower or unusable items of chosen types (Weapons, Movement, Transport).
